titleStmt.title: An essay of original righteousness and conveyed sin wherein the question is sightly stated, the latent venome of some of Dr. Jeremiah Tayler's heretical assertions detected, and accurately impugn'd. By [J.] Ford gentlemen.
titleStmt.author: Ford, John, Mayor of Bath.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
